steps.title: Open Netflix Account Settings
steps.description: Go to www.netflix.com and sign in. Click on your profile icon in the top right corner and select 'Account'.

steps.title: Find Membership & Billing
steps.description: Scroll down to the 'Membership & Billing' section.

steps.title: Click 'Cancel Membership'
steps.description: Click on the 'Cancel Membership' button.

steps.title: Confirm Cancellation
steps.description: Click 'Finish Cancellation' to confirm. You'll have access until your current billing period ends.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: IMPORTANT: Also cancel your UPI mandate to stop future charges.

steps.title: Go to Account & Settings
steps.description: Visit https://www.primevideo.com and sign in. Hover over your profile name and select 'Account & Settings'.

steps.title: Select 'Your Account' Tab
steps.description: In the 'Account & Settings' menu, click on the 'Your Account' tab.

steps.title: Click 'End Subscription'
steps.description: Under 'Prime Video Channels', find the subscription you want to cancel and click 'End Subscription'.

steps.title: Confirm Cancellation
steps.description: Follow the prompts to confirm the cancellation of your subscription.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: IMPORTANT: Also cancel your UPI mandate to stop future charges.

steps: Find 'Amazon Prime Video' in the list

steps.title: Access 'My Space'
steps.description: Open the Disney+ Hotstar app or website and sign in. Click on 'My Space'.

steps.title: Navigate to 'Help & Settings'
steps.description: In 'My Space', click on 'Help & Settings'.

steps.title: Select 'Subscription & Devices'
steps.description: Under 'Help & Settings', click on 'Subscription & Devices'.

steps.title: Click 'Cancel'
steps.description: Click on 'Cancel' to initiate the cancellation process.

steps.title: Confirm Cancellation
steps.description: Follow the prompts to confirm the cancellation of your subscription.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: IMPORTANT: Also cancel your UPI mandate to stop future charges.

steps.title: Log into Your Account
steps.description: Visit https://www.spotify.com and sign in to your account.

steps.title: Go to 'Your Plan'
steps.description: Click on 'Your Plan' under your account settings.

steps.title: Click 'Change Plan'
steps.description: Click on 'Change Plan'.

steps.title: Select 'Cancel Premium'
steps.description: Scroll down and click on 'Cancel Premium'.

steps.title: Confirm Cancellation
steps.description: Follow the prompts to confirm the cancellation of your subscription.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: IMPORTANT: Also cancel your UPI mandate to stop future charges.

steps.title: Go to YouTube Settings
steps.description: Open the YouTube app or website and sign in. Click on your profile picture and select 'Settings'.

steps.title: Select 'Purchases and Memberships'
steps.description: In 'Settings', click on 'Purchases and Memberships'.

steps.title: Click 'Manage Membership'
steps.description: Under 'Memberships', click on 'Manage Membership'.

steps.title: Click 'Deactivate'
steps.description: Click on 'Deactivate' or 'Cancel Membership' and follow the prompts to confirm.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: Cancel your UPI mandate to stop future automatic payments.

steps.title: Login to Zee5
steps.description: Go to https://www.zee5.com and log in with your account.

steps.title: Access Account Settings
steps.description: Click on your profile picture and select 'Account'.

steps.title: Select 'Subscription'
steps.description: Go to 'Subscription' to see your active plan.

steps.title: Click 'Cancel Subscription'
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Subscription' and confirm the action.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: Cancel UPI auto-pay to avoid future charges.

steps.title: Sign in to SonyLIV
steps.description: Visit https://www.sonyliv.com and log in.

steps.title: Go to 'Account'
steps.description: Click on profile icon > 'Account'.

steps.title: Select Subscription
steps.description: Click on your subscription plan.

steps.title: Click 'Cancel'
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Subscription' and follow the confirmation steps.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: Cancel UPI mandate to stop recurring payments.

steps.title: Open Zomato App
steps.description: Sign in and go to your profile.

steps.title: Go to 'Pro Membership'
steps.description: Click on 'Pro Membership' under profile.

steps.title: Select 'Cancel Membership'
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Membership' and confirm.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: Cancel UPI mandate to prevent future deductions.

steps.title: Open Swiggy App
steps.description: Sign in to your Swiggy account and tap on your profile.

steps.title: Go to 'Swiggy One Membership'
steps.description: Select 'Swiggy One' from profile menu.

steps.title: Tap 'Cancel Membership'
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Membership' and follow prompts.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: Cancel UPI mandate to avoid further charges.

steps.title: Open JioSaavn App
steps.description: Sign in and go to 'Settings'.

steps.title: Go to 'My Subscription'
steps.description: Click on 'Subscription' to view plan.

steps.title: Select 'Cancel Subscription'
steps.description: Tap 'Cancel Subscription' and confirm.

steps.title: Cancel UPI Auto-Pay
steps.description: Cancel UPI mandate to avoid auto-charges.

steps.title: Login to Voot
steps.description: Go to https://www.voot.com and sign in.

steps.title: Go to 'My Account'
steps.description: Click on profile > 'Account'.

steps.title: Select 'Cancel Subscription'
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Subscription' and follow confirmation.

steps.title: Open Gaana App
steps.description: Sign in and navigate to 'Settings'.

steps.title: Select 'Subscription'
steps.description: Go to 'Subscription' to view active plan.

steps.title: Cancel Subscription
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Subscription' and confirm.

steps.title: Login to MakeMyTrip
steps.description: Go to https://www.makemytrip.com and sign in.

steps.title: Go to 'Profile' > 'My Bookings'
steps.description: Click 'Profile' > 'My Bookings' to find active plans.

steps.title: Cancel Subscription
steps.description: Select the subscription or membership and click 'Cancel'.

steps.title: Open BookMyShow App
steps.description: Sign in and go to your profile.

steps.title: Go to 'BMS Wallet / Membership'
steps.description: Select your membership plan.

steps.title: Cancel Membership
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Membership' and confirm.

steps.title: Login to Times Prime
steps.description: Visit https://www.timesprime.com and log in.

steps.title: Go to 'My Account' > 'Membership'
steps.description: Select 'Membership' to see active plans.

steps.title: Cancel Membership
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Membership' and follow confirmation steps.

steps.title: Open Ola App
steps.description: Sign in and navigate to 'Wallet'.

steps.title: Go to 'Ola Money Subscription'
steps.description: Click on your subscription plan.

steps.title: Cancel Subscription
steps.description: Click 'Cancel' and confirm.

steps.title: Login to TATA Play Account
steps.description: Visit https://www.tataplaybinge.com and sign in.

steps.title: Go to 'My Subscriptions'
steps.description: Navigate to 'My Subscriptions'.

steps.title: Cancel Subscription
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Subscription' and confirm.

steps.title: Login to Audible
steps.description: Go to https://www.audible.in and log in.

steps.title: Go to 'Account Details'
steps.description: Click profile > 'Account Details'.

steps.title: Cancel Membership
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Membership' and confirm.

steps.title: Login to Amazon Account
steps.description: Visit https://www.amazon.in/kindleunlimited and sign in.

steps.title: Go to 'Manage Subscription'
steps.description: Click 'Manage Subscription'.

steps.title: Cancel Membership
steps.description: Select 'Cancel Subscription' and confirm.

steps.title: Login to Cult.fit App
steps.description: Sign in and navigate to 'Profile'.

steps.title: Go to 'Memberships'
steps.description: Select your active membership plan.

steps.title: Cancel Membership
steps.description: Click 'Cancel Membership' and follow prompts.
